RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the law enforcement officers' role and f: United States Border Patrol agents' role and function

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Agent Marco Montemayor: Law enforcement officer who conducted an interview with IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.
Driver of the black Dodge pickup truck, subject of the traffic stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol agents: Law enforcement officers with experience in detecting illegal activity, entitled to assess facts based on their experience
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Miranda rights: Legal rights read to an individual during an arrest or interrogation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Miranda waiver: Document signed by an individual waiving their Miranda rights
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.a written Miranda waiver: Document signed by IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. to waive his Miranda rights
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.waiver of Miranda rights: IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s decision to give up his right to remain silent and cooperate with law enforcement
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol agents' role: Responsibilities of law enforcement officers in conducting interviews, interrogations, and traffic stops
